subject: Golf
Texas Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Billy Horschel shot a two-under 70 to take a two-shot lead over Jim Furyk and Charley Hoffman after three rounds of the PGA’s Texas Open in San Antonio.
snippet: Billy Horschel shot a two-under 70 to take a two-shot lead over Jim Furyk and Charley Hoffman after three rounds of the PGA’s Texas Open in San Antonio.
